categories: Category:Star Wars: The Bad Batch voice actors

nodes.text: Ming-Na Wen (born November 20, 1963) is an American actress and voice actress who portrayed Fennec Shand in the Disney+ live-action TV series The Mandalorian. Wen is known for portraying Agent Melinda May in the TV series Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., as well for portraying Dr. Jing-Mei Chen in the medical drama series ER. As a voice actress, Ming-Na Wen is best known for voicing Disney Princess Fa Mulan in the animated movie Mulan.
